description: This policy checks the Lifecycle management policies are configured on EFS volumes.Lifecycle management policies automatically manages cost-effective storage for file systems.When enabled lifecycle management migrates files that have not been accessed for a set period of time to the EFS Standard Infrequent Access ('Standard IA') or One Zone Infrequent Access ('One Zone IA') storage class depending on your file system.
name: AWS_EFS_LIFECYCLE_RECOMMEND
